page.title: 16Recreation of Adults
page.content: A survey was sent to over 100 homes in the village to discover how adults spent their leisure time. Participating in sports was popular 41% were members of a sports club. Swimming clubs were the most popular, with badminton and squash second and third in popularity. Over half of those members participated once a week. 20% spectated at football matches and 11% at cricket matches. Of pastimes at home, watching television was the most popular, with 85% viewing most nights. The second most popular pastime was gardening (80%_seasonal). Other pursuits included reading, sewing, playing board and card games, baking and music. 42% say they're members of a social club,e.g Community Centre.
